downloadTitle: Install and Configuration in Microsoft Dynamics SL 2015
downloadDescription: ​This training provides individuals with the knowledge and skills to build a comprehensive understanding of the Installation and Configuration of Microsoft Dynamics SL 2015.
detailsSection:
Audience This training is intended for partners, end users, IT professionals or accounting professionals who utilize or maintain the Installation and Configuration of Microsoft Dynamics SL. At Training Material Completion After completing this course, students will be able to:
  • Understand how to install Microsoft Dynamics SL, including a server and client install.
  • Understand how to install other components of Microsoft Dynamics SL including Crystal Reports, and Application Server.
  • Understand the directory structure of the Microsoft Dynamics SL program files.
  • Use tools to troubleshoot performance and monitor errors and access.
  • Use the Microsoft Dynamics SL security and access rights features.​
